decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the variation to the proposed opening hours and number of users would not result in an unacceptable intensification of the use that would be of detriment to the amenities of local residential occupiers in terms of general disturbance, and have an adverse impact on the local highway network, contrary to Policies 6.3, 6.13, 7.15 of the London Plan (2016), Policies D14, T4 and T6 of the draft London Plan - intend to publish version (2019), Policies DM1, DM43 and  DM46 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and Policy AAP19 of the Harrow and Wealdstone Area Action Plan (2013)
description: Variation of Conditions 11 (Opening Hours) and 13 (Visitor and Staff Numbers) attached to planning permission P/1004/19 dated 22.11.19 to amend the opening times from 8am to 10.30 pm Monday to Sunday inclusive of Bank Holidays to 0800 to 2300 hours Mondays to Saturdays inclusive of public holidays and 2230 hours on Sundays.  With the following exceptions that i) the first floor temple may be open for prayer from 2300 hours on 31st December to 0800 hours the following day being 1st January and ii) be open to celebrate the festival of Sivarathiri for a day from 0800 hours and the following night to 0759 hours the next day. To allow increase of maximum number of staff and patrons from 150 persons to 330 persons at any one time
